* Test package briefly to see that license + readme etc is ok

* Write email til educational license customers (email from 3.2 release 
attached)

* Give email + link to the package to Erik B / Mike so that they can place 
package on customer's ftp-sites + send out email.

* Send out email to ms@trolltech.com to inform about the release

Regarding:
* ReadMe
   - Update Readme-file (p4: qt/main/dist/edu)
   - if larger changes: let doc-team know that you are going to need 
     their help to review the new text so that they can plan for it

* License
   - Check that the license is up to date (p4: qt/main/dist/edu)
   - The license needs to be in two versions: TTNO and TTUS
